{{Wired embedded system |brand=Check Point |model=L-61i |asin=B015OKJ0LU |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=HannStar |manuf_model=CIP1100 |manuf_rev=VER:E |pcb_id=4BQ00CIPE1X10 |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Cavium |cpu1_model=CN7010 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MTFC4GMDEA-4M IT |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K128M16JT-125 IT |ram1_num=4 |expansion_if_types=SFP, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=2 |serial=yes,, RJ45 console,, (115200 8N1), |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1322 |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6350R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=2 |addl_chips=Dual FET Bus Switch w/Level Shifting;TI;SN74CBTD3306;;3;,,, Hardware Monitoring IC;Novoton;NCT7802Y;;2;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, Low Voltage Buffer/Line Driver;Fairchild;74LCX244;;2;,,, 802.3at PD w/ Synchronous Flyback Controller;Linear Technology;LTC4278;;1;,,, 100V, 60A N-Channel MOSFET;ON Semi;FDMS86101;;1;,,, 60V N-Channel MOSFET;Infineon;BSC034N06NS;;1;,,, 1A Power-Distribution Switch;Texas Instruments;TPS2061;;2;,,, Serial I2C Real Time Clock;Renesas;IDT1339;;1;,,, 1A Low Dropout Voltage Regulator;Globaltech;GS1117A;;1;,,, 8K I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C64D;;1;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, SFP ports, RTC w/ battery backup, heatsink, metal case, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2013.07 |stock_os=Linux;3.10.20; |oui_eth=00:1C:7F }} {{TagLine|Check Point L-61i Security Appliance}} :''with 4-Port Gigabit LAN Switch'' :[https://www.checkpoint.com/downloads/product-related/datasheets/ds-1200R-rugged-appliance.pdf Datasheet]
Check Point L-61i - Next Generation Security Appliance :CPAP-SG1200R-NGFW - 1200R Next Generation Firewall Security Appliance :CPAP-SG1200R-NGTP - 1200R Next Generation Threat Prevention Security Appliance
"CIP1100 VER:E", "4BQ00CIPE1X10" and "MADE IN TAIWAN" are silkscreened on board
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Cavium]]'' CN7010 MIPS64 v3 (@1.2GHz) *Memory: 1GB (SDRAM) DDR3 *Storage: 4GB MMC Flash, TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card *Network: 4x Gigabit Ethernet, 2x Shared Gigabit/SFP ports *USB: 1x USB 3.0 port, 1x USB 2.0 port *Power: 12V, 2A via barrel or 12-72V DC via 3
==Images== <gallery> File:Check Point L-61i Internal.jpeg|Internal View File:Check Point L-61i Top.jpeg|Board Top File:Check Point L-61i Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
